ques: Which metric measures the time it takes for a system to process a request and return a response?

ques: Which metric tracks the percentage of failed requests (e.g., HTTP 500 errors) compared to total requests?

title: Saturation ü•§
ques: Which metric indicates how "full" your most constrained resources are (e.g., CPU load, memory usage)?
